title: WHAT CAN I DO IN QUANTUM METAVERSE?
desc: Virtual visitors at Quantum Metaverse will be able to become true paleontologists thanks to our NFT game, acquire exclusive NFT fossils, minerals and meteorites in our gallery 'The art of Nature' or learn from the real-scale renderings of one of the best collections about history of life in our virtual Quantum museum.
metaversedesc: It will be based on 3 fundamental pillars with the aim of reaching all possible audiences within the metaverse:
